traits.name: Weird Aura
entries: At the start of each of the gargantua's turns, each creature of the gargantua's choice within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target sees the gargantua as a manifestation of the target's worst fears; it takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psychic damage and has the {@condition frightened} condition until the start of the target's next turn. On a successful save, a target is immune to this gargantua's Weird Aura for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The gargantua makes two Slam or Rock attacks.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +15 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 27 (3d12 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +15 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.
